title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 52.5 - No work for employee to be done in institution
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 52.5 - No work for employee to be done in institution

State Regulations

No work shall be done in any shop or department of an
institution for any employee or other person; nor shall any property or
material be delivered from any shop or department to any employee or other
person except by written order of the warden. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
52.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
